snippet: With six killings last week, the number of homicides in just five months in Seattle reached 21, as many as in all of last year.
abstract: Wave of gun violence in Seattle unnerves city and shakes residents' notion of security; with the latest six killings occurring over a period of one week, the number of homicides in the first five months of 2012 has already reached the previous year's total of 21; killings come as the Seattle Police Department is already under scrutiny.
lead_paragraph: With six killings last week, the number of homicides in just five months in Seattle reached 21, as many as in all of last year.

headline.main: Gun Violence Wave Challenges Seattle’s Notion of Security
headline.print_headline: Wave of Gun Violence Challenges Seattle’s Notion of Security
